NK080(wu)005:1541: lhag ma ni ci'ang ma yin pa'i tshul 'chad pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1542: tsam bzhi byas dngos lhar 'dod pa'i //
NK080(wu)005:1543: dngos po rnam drug la sogs pa /
NK080(wu)005:1544: gang yang ma na phyir nges tshig ldan /
NK080(wu)005:1546: lta ba yin pa med pa'i nges tshig ni /
NK080(wu)005:1550: sgyu ma tsam dang bzhi dang /
NK080(wu)005:1551: byed pa pos byas par lta ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:1552: dngos po lhar snang lugs kyi lta ba bzhi gcig tu rtsis pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:1553: lta ba'i ngo bo drug gis bsdus pa ni /
NK080(wu)005:1555: nyan thos kyi zad par gyi skye mched bcu snang ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:1556: rang rgyal ba'i lta ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:1557: kun brtags kyi lta ngan gyi snang ba nyi shu
NK080(wu)005:1558: rtsa drug po de'i phyogs chad gang yang min te
NK080(wu)005:1559: thams cad par rang snang la phyogs 'dzin med par
NK080(wu)005:1560: rang rig rang gsal bas nges pa'i tshig yod do
NK080(wu)005:1561: // 'o na lta ngan gzhi la grub bo snyam pa la /
NK080(wu)005:1562: yul bral gnyis med rang mi dmigs /
NK080(wu)005:1563: kun bzang nyid kyis bstan dka' la /
NK080(wu)005:1565: spyod yul bshad pa ltar gnyis med pa'i ye shes
NK080(wu)005:1566: thams cad par shar yang ngo bo'i rang gi mtshan
NK080(wu)005:1567: nyid mi rnyed pa'i phyir ston pa nyid kyis gzhan
NK080(wu)005:1570: byed po chos tsam skad cig dang //
NK080(wu)005:1572: mu stegs rtag pa dang nyan thos dang sems tsam gyi lta ba yang med de /
NK080(wu)005:1575: rgyun mi rtag pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:1576: sgyu snang rtogs pa'i rig snang dang //
NK080(wu)005:1578: mdo sde dbu ma dang kri ya'i lta ba ltar yang med de /
NK080(wu)005:1579: rang 'byung ye shes rkyen bzhis ma byas la bden
NK080(wu)005:1580: pa dang snang stong res 'byung med pa'i phyir ro
NK080(wu)005:1581: // rlabs dang cho 'phrul rtsal snang ba //
NK080(wu)005:1583: rang snang gi ye shes ni yo ga dang ma
NK080(wu)005:1584: h+aa yo ga a nu yo ga'i lta ba ltar
NK080(wu)005:1585: yang med de / ma brgyud pa dang gzhi rtsa med pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:1587: 'byed pa bdun gyi rtsol ba med pa'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:1588: lta ba de kun gyi dri ma gdod nas bral gzhi med pas /
NK080(wu)005:1589: 'di la gdod nas yod ma yin /
NK080(wu)005:1591: 'o na de dag gud du spangs te tha dad do snyam pa la /
NK080(wu)005:1592: rigs pa bzhis snang rlabs sogs pa'ang /
NK080(wu)005:1593: bltas dbang tsa ma te bye brag med /
NK080(wu)005:1595: dbu ma'i lta ba dang yo ga'i lta bas bsdus pa'i brjod pa thams cad de /
NK080(wu)005:1596: de dag rang rang gi shes rab kyi dbang pos
NK080(wu)005:1597: lta ba tha dad kyi rab tu snang ba ste
NK080(wu)005:1598: / sgra 'gog pas bshad pa bzhin 'dir ma 'dres
NK080(wu)005:1599: la yongs su rdzogs pas ris gzhi med par gsungs
NK080(wu)005:1600: / so // stong pa chen po'i lta ba bstan pa'i phyir //
NK080(wu)005:1601: rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen de bzhin //
NK080(wu)005:1603: gang 'khrul pa la rgyu rkyen las skyes pas 'gag par snang ba'ang ma spangs bzhin /
NK080(wu)005:1604: rgyu nyid rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs la sogs pa
NK080(wu)005:1605: gang rung gis brtsad bcad na rang rig pa snang
NK080(wu)005:1606: ste / rgyu ther zug tu ma red pas ngo
NK080(wu)005:1607: bo mi phyed pa rdo rjer rang byung gi ye
NK080(wu)005:1608: shes kyi phyir rkyen rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o //
NK080(wu)005:1609: de la rgyu rkyen logs na rang rgyud du yod
NK080(wu)005:1610: na grub pa yin pas de nyid du bstan par
NK080(wu)005:1611: rigs na dus gsum du mi brtan no //
NK080(wu)005:1612: de phyir rgyu rkyen rang rgyud du ma grub pas /
NK080(wu)005:1613: des na skye med 'gag sogs stong /
NK080(wu)005:1615: med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:1617: rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen dang 'dra /
NK080(wu)005:1618: ma skyes pas na 'jig pa med /
NK080(wu)005:1619: gdod nas snying po byang chub la //
NK080(wu)005:1620: btsal ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi bskyed //
NK080(wu)005:1622: bdag las gzhan pa'ang mi snang zhing //
NK080(wu)005:1624: rang rig snang bas yul med pa'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:1625: 'on te bdag gi sems ni ril po yi skad cig la sogs pa yod do zhe na /
NK080(wu)005:1627: snang med stong pa chen por gsungs //
NK080(wu)005:1629: bdag kyang thams cad par snang ba'i phyir na mtshan nyid mi rnyed pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:1630: yul sems gnyis su med pa'i stong pa chen po ste /
NK080(wu)005:1633: tha dad stong pa nyid dang /
NK080(wu)005:1634: thun mong gi stong chen rnams las khyad par du gyur pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1635: 'on te 'dir snang ba 'gag par dogs pa la /
NK080(wu)005:1636: gnyis bsdus brjod snang thams cad kun /
NK080(wu)005:1637: mi 'gog sems las gzhan med pas /
NK080(wu)005:1638: 'dogs snang brtag par rung ma yin /
NK080(wu)005:1640: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pas bsdus pa'i
NK080(wu)005:1641: bye brag ming du brjod cing zhen blo la snang
NK080(wu)005:1642: ba thams cad sems nyid kyi phyir gang yang mi
NK080(wu)005:1643: spang ste / shong yangs tha snyad du 'dogs su
NK080(wu)005:1644: snang gi zhen pas gzung du mi rung ste 'ching
NK080(wu)005:1645: spang ste / ba'i phyir ro // de bas na
NK080(wu)005:1646: stong pa chen po ni thams cad kyi gzhi yin
NK080(wu)005:1647: spang ste / ba'i phyir ro // pa'i phyir / rnam pa kun ldan stong chen por //
NK080(wu)005:1648: sangs rgyas bas kyang sngar sangs rgyas //
NK080(wu)005:1650: kun bral nyag gcig ji yang ma spangs pa'i sems nyid ni /
NK080(wu)005:1651: sgro skur bla dwags las grol bas thog ma med
NK080(wu)005:1652: pa nas sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas
NK080(wu)005:1653: pa'i che ba yang yin te /
NK080(wu)005:1654: gzhir gyur la mu mtha' med pas dri med kun snum pas 'phags pa'i phyir te /
NK080(wu)005:1656: gdeng de ltar sus chud pa ni shes rab kyi spyad dam pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1657: de nyid bstan par bya ba ni /
NK080(wu)005:1658: snang gsum grags pa'i chos rnams kun //
NK080(wu)005:1660: 'khrul pa dang gdul bya dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang bar grags so cog go /
NK080(wu)005:1661: 'di las brtags nas bdag snang phyir /
NK080(wu)005:1663: ngo bo nyid kyi snang bar nye bar bzung ba'i
NK080(wu)005:1664: gzhi la gsum du blos brtags nas ming du grags
NK080(wu)005:1665: dkris pas snang du btub pa ni gzhi lam 'bras
NK080(wu)005:1666: bu'i gzhi yin pa'i gtan tshigs so //
NK080(wu)005:1667: 'o na rgyal ba la'ang kun brtags yod do zhe na /
NK080(wu)005:1668: gdul bya'i dbang btsan par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:1669: thams cad kun snang gzhi rtsar bshad pa /
NK080(wu)005:1671: bskyed bya skyed byed mi 'dod de /
NK080(wu)005:1672: ming gis rgyud bzang ngan ltar tha snyad gdags na ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu ste /
NK080(wu)005:1674: rnam par dag pa rgyu nas dag /rang snang 'bras bu dang po nas //
NK080(wu)005:1675: 'phags pa'i rang bzhin rgyu la rdzogs //
NK080(wu)005:1676: zhe bka' stsal ba'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:1677: des na dbyings kyi thig le'ang yin no //
NK080(wu)005:1678: de lta bu'i stong pa chen po ni /
NK080(wu)005:1679: dbu ma'i stong ltas mi rnyed pa ste /
NK080(wu)005:1680: thig le chen po kun tu chub gnas pa //
NK080(wu)005:1681: stong pas btsal yang rnyed par mi 'gyur de //
NK080(wu)005:1683: de ci smos rnal 'byor chen po'i de bzhin nyid
NK080(wu)005:1684: ting nge 'dzin yang stong par zang mar bsgoms na
NK080(wu)005:1687: gzhung nyams pas don med par rgyud du ma las gsungs te lam gol ba'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:1688: 'o na snang ba gsum bstan pa la dgos pa med do snyam pa la /
NK080(wu)005:1689: gang yang gdod nas yod min pas //
NK080(wu)005:1690: btags rnams khye bus khye tshul gsungs //
NK080(wu)005:1692: de dag gzhi la ye nas rang rgyud du ma
NK080(wu)005:1693: grub pa'i phyir tha snyad tsam du btags pa ni
NK080(wu)005:1694: khye'u yis khye'u sngon ma 'byin pa lta bu'i tshul
NK080(wu)005:1695: du dgongs pas bka' stsal pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1696: bdag nyid chen po'i lta ba bstan pa'i phyir //
NK080(wu)005:1697: dus gsum chos rnams gcig khyad med //
NK080(wu)005:1698: snga med phyis med gdod nas byung //
NK080(wu)005:1700: bdag nyid chen po'i sangs rgyas pa'i che ba ste /
NK080(wu)005:1701: gang rgyu 'bras rnam par spyan zin pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:1702: rgyu rkyen spyad la 'bras bu ma spyad pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:1703: rgyu rkyen 'tshogs la ma spyad pa'i chos thams cad
NK080(wu)005:1704: dang bshad pa'i rgyu rkyen ye shes rdo rje rang
NK080(wu)005:1705: dag pas sems rang byung ba'i ye shes kyi ngang
NK080(wu)005:1706: du shin tu rnam par gcig pas bzang ngan med
NK080(wu)005:1707: pa ni snga phyi ma spangs rang bral ba ye
NK080(wu)005:1708: shar bas bdag nyid chen po ste gtan tshigs gsum
NK080(wu)005:1709: dang gcig gis grub pa yin pas cis kyang lags
NK080(wu)005:1711: thams cad sems gsal de bzhin nyid //
NK080(wu)005:1712: ma byas rgyun min phyogs med gsal //
NK080(wu)005:1714: mngon pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i che che ba dang ye shes chen po'i thig le yang yin te /
NK080(wu)005:1715: chos so cog rang bzhin gyis ma nges pa dang
NK080(wu)005:1716: cir bsam par snang ba brtags par 'chags par rang
NK080(wu)005:1717: rgyud du ba bstan ba'i phyir rang rig par gsal
NK080(wu)005:1718: ba la the tshom med de /
NK080(wu)005:1719: sems ni ma bcos ma bslad pas mi 'grub pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so //
NK080(wu)005:1720: de bas na rgyu rkyen las ma byas par thams cad ye nas gsal ba'i phyir dang /
NK080(wu)005:1721: skad cig ma'i rgyun du mi gnas par ye gsal ba'i phyir dang /
NK080(wu)005:1722: phyogs ris med par thams cad ye gsal ba'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:1723: ye shes ming bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid /
NK080(wu)005:1726: rang byung gi ye shes kyang yin /
NK080(wu)005:1727: mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyang yin /
NK080(wu)005:1728: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang yin te /
NK080(wu)005:1729: mtshan nyid kyi rnam grangs de lta'ang /
NK080(wu)005:1730: yul bral ba dang thams cad der gcig pa'i phyir //
NK080(wu)005:1731: mtha' bral bsam pa'i yul las 'das //
NK080(wu)005:1733: lhag pa'i ye shes la rgyu 'bras med pas skye 'gag med /
NK080(wu)005:1734: de'i phyir bdag gzhan gyi mtha' med /
NK080(wu)005:1736: de'i phyir rtag chad kyi mtha' med do //
NK080(wu)005:1738: de gnyis med phyir skye dang 'jig pa med /
NK080(wu)005:1739: skye 'jig med phyir bdag gzhan med de 'chi 'pho med phyir rtag chad med /
NK080(wu)005:1741: 'on te na dbus yod do snyam pa la /
NK080(wu)005:1742: dbus nyid kyang tha snyad la ltos pa'i dgos pa ste /
NK080(wu)005:1743: mtha' gsum med na dbus ci la thogs te /
NK080(wu)005:1744: yod las ltos pa'i med pa'ang med de med pa yi med pa'ang med /
NK080(wu)005:1745: mtha' rnams med phyir dbus med dbus la'ang gnas par mi byed do //
NK080(wu)005:1747: da ni 'di'i don mtha' kun las grol ba gcig tu yid la bya'o zhe na /
NK080(wu)005:1749: grol dang ma grol la sogs pa //
NK080(wu)005:1750: gnyis su rtog pa thams cad mtha' //zhes snang bas
NK080(wu)005:1751: ma spangs bral la gang yang ma bkol bas 'du
NK080(wu)005:1752: shes kyi yul dang bral ba rang rig pa'i mngon
NK080(wu)005:1755: thig le chen po gcig pu nyid //
NK080(wu)005:1757: dbyibs kyis mtshon pa ni yul bcad pas ye shes rang snang du zlum pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1758: 'o na rtag par 'gyur ro zhe na /
NK080(wu)005:1759: ther zug rgyun las ye nas grol //
NK080(wu)005:1761: ye shes thig le'i mtshan nyid ni tha snyad gdags
NK080(wu)005:1762: pa gcig shos med pa la gcig pur brjod kyi
NK080(wu)005:1763: ngo bo rdzas can med de cir yang snang ba'i
NK080(wu)005:1764: phyir ro // 'dra ba'i gol sa dang lta ba'i khyad par brtan pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:1765: don dam nor bdun gzhan 'dod pa'ang /
NK080(wu)005:1766: gdul bya'i ngo ste 'dod ma yin //
NK080(wu)005:1768: rnal 'byor chen po sku gsungs thugs yon tan phrin
NK080(wu)005:1769: las lnga dang dbyings dang ye shes ma 'dres rdzogs
NK080(wu)005:1770: pa'i rig pa don dam pa bzhed pa dang 'dra
NK080(wu)005:1771: 'dra'o zhe na / 'dir mi mthun par 'dren pa'i
NK080(wu)005:1772: sgras de dag gdul bya brod pa bskyed pa'i ngo
NK080(wu)005:1773: btsan tsam las yang dag par ma yin te //
NK080(wu)005:1774: 'dir grangs thob kyi rtsol ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:1775: gang yang dam par mi blta ba //
NK080(wu)005:1777: 'di la don dam lhag pa bshad pa med phyir
NK080(wu)005:1778: mchog tu 'dzin pa dang bral bas ji ltar 'gyur
NK080(wu)005:1779: zhe na / ci bsam skyon med bya lam dang /
NK080(wu)005:1781: khyung phrug ltar 'gyur te khyung ni lding ba'i tshe khebs 'og tu tshud pa bsal ba /
NK080(wu)005:1784: rjes med par gyur pa lta bu las /
NK080(wu)005:1785: 'dir tha ma dang mthun pa ste dran rtog ma bkag la zin chags med pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1786: sgyu shes bslu ba med pa bzhin //
NK080(wu)005:1788: sgyu ma mkhan la bslur mi tshugs pa bzhin du /
NK080(wu)005:1789: 'di la gol sa yod ma yin /
NK080(wu)005:1791: gdeng can la gol ba'i gnas ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:1793: mnyam rdzogs bdag nyid chen po'i phyir //
NK080(wu)005:1795: bshad zin te gtan tshigs so //
NK080(wu)005:1796: bden pa gnyis kyi snyad las 'das //
NK080(wu)005:1798: snang stong phye nas gnyis med du mi bsgrub pas
NK080(wu)005:1799: ye nas thun mong gnyis dang lhag pa'i gnyis su
NK080(wu)005:1801: ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs par bsnyad pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1803: gang zag sgyu ma bkri don bden gnyis med /
NK080(wu)005:1804: ces snang ste man chad las spang pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1805: dbu ma gol sa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:1806: bzhi gnyis spros bral chos kyi dbyings //
NK080(wu)005:1808: rtag chad dang 'gro 'ong dang skye 'gag dang gcig
NK080(wu)005:1809: du mar bral ba'i snang ba med pa ni chos
NK080(wu)005:1811: lugs kyi sgyu ma'i rdzas la /
NK080(wu)005:1812: chos kyi dbyings mdog yan lag tu ma 'dus pas gcig mi grub la /
NK080(wu)005:1813: gzhi de'i phyir du ma med par smra ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:1814: mu bzhi skye ba 'gog pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:1815: rten 'brel dang bshad pas sgyu ma yang ma skyes pas mi 'jig pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:1816: don dam par yul sems rten 'brel gyis ma skyes pas 'du 'phro med pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:1817: snang ma myong bas mi rtag cing /
NK080(wu)005:1818: glo bur du snang ba med pa ma yin pas ma chad pa ni brgyad bzhi dang bral ba'o //
NK080(wu)005:1819: rang bzhin gyis stong de bzhin nyid //
NK080(wu)005:1820: gdod nas skye ba med pa'i ngang //
NK080(wu)005:1821: rigs bzhis nges pa don dam dngos //
NK080(wu)005:1822: bla med mi gnas nges pa 'dod /
NK080(wu)005:1824: gang bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor dag /chos so cog byas nas stong pa ma yin te /
NK080(wu)005:1825: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid kyi rigs pas ma grub pa ming grangs stong pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:1826: ma bcos pas skye ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
NK080(wu)005:1827: ye nas skye ba med pa la 'du shes kyi
NK080(wu)005:1828: zug rngu med pa de bshad pa'i rigs pa bzhis
NK080(wu)005:1829: nges par byas pa dam pa'i don gyis ngo bo
NK080(wu)005:1830: byis pa'i blo mtha' sel ba dag gi bzhed do
NK080(wu)005:1831: // gsang sngags kyi gol sa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:1832: de nyid rang rig kho na'i phyir //
NK080(wu)005:1833: stong nyid ye shes ngo bo las //
NK080(wu)005:1834: byin rlabs snang ba'i gzhir gyur pas //
NK080(wu)005:1835: yid bzhin nor ltar rim snang ba //
NK080(wu)005:1836: rjes thob la sogs theg pa'i gzhung //
NK080(wu)005:1838: sngags yo ga pas dbu ma'i don dam pa de
NK080(wu)005:1839: nyid shes bya min te rang rig pa ma skyes
NK080(wu)005:1840: par nges par gzung ba'i gtan tshigs kyis /
NK080(wu)005:1841: rang rig mtha' skyon bral ba'i dbyings rnam par dag
NK080(wu)005:1842: pa'i ye shes ni byin rlabs kyi gzhir gyur pa'i
NK080(wu)005:1843: phyin / yid bzhin nor bu lta bur bshad pa bzhin byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i lhar lta'o //
NK080(wu)005:1845: rjes thob la sogs kyi bsdu ba'ang bshad pa ltar rang rang gis mos pa bzhin /
NK080(wu)005:1846: sems de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyi yon tan
NK080(wu)005:1847: dang cho 'phrul dang rtsal rang snang ba lhar byung
NK080(wu)005:1848: ba ni / dbu ma las 'bras bu lam du
NK080(wu)005:1849: gyur pa dang brgyud pa'i tshogs la rag ma lus
NK080(wu)005:1850: ba ni / pa dang / dus la mi ltos pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:1851: rgyu nyid du rig pa'i yul du mar gyur pas dpags pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1852: de bas na dper bzang mo rke stong dang bzang
NK080(wu)005:1853: mo skye med bya ba ltar dbu ma'i snang ba
NK080(wu)005:1854: mang po ni bzang mo med pa ste ye chad
NK080(wu)005:1858: gsang ba ni rke stong yang bzang mo med pa ma yin pa ltar /
NK080(wu)005:1859: zhen pa med du zad kyang snang ba mi spang bas stong pa chen po'o //
NK080(wu)005:1860: de snang ba ma spangs pa'i phyir so sor lhar
NK080(wu)005:1861: rig pa snang bas don byed pa dag go /snang
NK080(wu)005:1862: ba med pas mo gsham bu mo la bu mi
NK080(wu)005:1864: yon tan la khyad par che bar dgongs so //
NK080(wu)005:1865: dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las /
NK080(wu)005:1866: 'od srungs kyis stong pa nyid la dmigs pas stong pas nyid kyi phyir 'brang ba de dag ni /
NK080(wu)005:1867: gsung rab 'di la 'khyam par ngas bshad do //
NK080(wu)005:1868: 'od srung ri rab tsam gyi gang zag la bdag
NK080(wu)005:1869: tu lta ba gnas kyang bla'i nga rgyal can stong
NK080(wu)005:1870: pa nyid du lta ba ni de lta ma yin
NK080(wu)005:1871: no // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
NK080(wu)005:1872: lta ba thams cad las byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na /
NK080(wu)005:1873: 'o srungs stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni gsor mi rung pa zhes bshad do //
NK080(wu)005:1875: rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid //
NK080(wu)005:1876: lta kun nges par 'byin pa ste //
NK080(wu)005:1877: gang zag stong pa nyid lta ba //
NK080(wu)005:1878: de ni gsor mi rung zhes bshad //
NK080(wu)005:1880: stong pa nyid la lta nyes na //
NK080(wu)005:1881: shes rab chung ldan phung par 'gyur //
NK080(wu)005:1882: ji ltar sprul la bzung nyes dang //
NK080(wu)005:1883: rig sngags log par bsgrub pa bzhin /
NK080(wu)005:1884: zhes phyir rol pa'i gzhung nyid las kyang nyen che bar bstan no //
NK080(wu)005:1886: mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes shing /
NK080(wu)005:1887: kun rdzob don dam gnyis 'byed la /
NK080(wu)005:1888: chos dang gang zag bdag med na //
NK080(wu)005:1889: 'dir ni byang chub sems dpa' yin //
NK080(wu)005:1890: zhes pas stong bltas gsang sngags mi mthong ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:1892: gtan tshigs kyi sgra mthun yang lugs las khyad par che'o //
NK080(wu)005:1893: gsang sngags kyi lta ba mthar gtugs pa shin tu
NK080(wu)005:1894: rnal 'byor 'di la ma reg par bstan pa'i phyir
NK080(wu)005:1895: / bden gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings //
NK080(wu)005:1897: gang rang rig pa'i cho 'phrul dang rtsal dang rang
NK080(wu)005:1898: snang ba la ni kun rdzob tu tha snyad 'dogs
NK080(wu)005:1899: te ye shes sgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:1900: de ltar snang ba gnyis rtsam na lugs so sos
NK080(wu)005:1901: rang rig tu'ang gcig pas mtha' gang du'ang snang ma
NK080(wu)005:1902: myong ba la 'khad pa ltar gsum gyis don dam
NK080(wu)005:1903: pa ste / shes rab dang dbyings kyi klong ngo //
NK080(wu)005:1904: de gnyis nyid na nyid kyi phyir ngo bo dbyer med pa ni /
NK080(wu)005:1905: sgyu ma snyigs shing gcig shos blo phyung ste /
NK080(wu)005:1906: che chung med pa ni thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te mu mtha' bral ba'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:1907: de nyid gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir //
NK080(wu)005:1908: dngos kun ma bcos sems gsal ba //
NK080(wu)005:1911: byed pa po rkyen gyis ma bsgyur bar rig pa'i ye shes su gsal ba'i phyir dang /
NK080(wu)005:1912: ma nor ma bcos de bzhin nyid //
NK080(wu)005:1913: 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang //
NK080(wu)005:1915: sems nyid dbyings dang ye shes gnyis ka'i bdag nyid
NK080(wu)005:1916: de sgro skur dang bral zhing bya bas mi rnyed
NK080(wu)005:1917: pas gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid sku gsung
NK080(wu)005:1918: thugs yon tan phrin las lnga sogs kyi dngos gzhi
NK080(wu)005:1919: bas / de rjes su byed pa po la 'dod
NK080(wu)005:1920: pa ltar cir yang snang ba ni zug rngu dang
NK080(wu)005:1921: bral bas lhun gyi grub pa'i ngang yang yin pa'i
NK080(wu)005:1922: bas / phyir / shes bya khyad 'gyur don dam gsum //
NK080(wu)005:1924: rang bzhin dang ye shes dang 'bras bu gsum rdzogs
NK080(wu)005:1925: pa'i bdag nyid de lhag pa'i don dam pa ste
NK080(wu)005:1926: / don dam du ni dkor bdun no //
NK080(wu)005:1927: zhes snang bas 'thad par smra ba'o //
NK080(wu)005:1929: de sogs ltos btags brjod bral ba'o //
NK080(wu)005:1932: las bsdus pa ni phyi ma'i don dam pa la
NK080(wu)005:1933: sogs pa kun rdzob la ltos nas btags pa'i bden
NK080(wu)005:1934: pa dang / gnyis med kyi tha snyad 'di la med par grub zin to //
NK080(wu)005:1935: lta ba'i khyad par gyi rjes su mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:1936: ming bzhi sogs mtshon shos bya nyid //
NK080(wu)005:1937: ye nas yin shes ye shes kyang //
NK080(wu)005:1939: bshad pa'i mtshan bzhir btags btags pas bsdus pa'i mtshan
NK080(wu)005:1940: bsam gyis mi khyab par grags pa'i mtshon pa'i gzhi
NK080(wu)005:1941: snying po byang chub rang byung gi ye shes ye
NK080(wu)005:1942: phyi mo nas yin pa'i don phyin ci ma log
NK080(wu)005:1943: par mngon du byas pas ming 'grub pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1944: mi mthun pa ni khyad par 'chad pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1947: so so'i khyad par 'byung ba'i gazhi'o //
NK080(wu)005:1948: rgyu yi gnyis dang bzhir 'dod pa /
NK080(wu)005:1949: yul phyir rgyud mthun skad cig ma'o //
NK080(wu)005:1951: de la tshogs brgyad ye shes bzhir gnas gyur pa ni /
NK080(wu)005:1952: rgyu'i theg pa lam gyi tshe yid so sor rtog pa'i shes rab dang /
NK080(wu)005:1953: mi dmigs pa'i shes rab tu gyur pa ste /
NK080(wu)005:1954: mthong lam thob pa'i tshe kun gzhi me long lta bu ye shes su bogs 'gyur /
NK080(wu)005:1955: nyon mongs pa'i yid mnyam pa nyid ye shes su gnas gyur /
NK080(wu)005:1957: sgo lnga bya ba grub par gyur pa gnas ngan len gnas par gyur pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1958: de nas sa brgyad pa dang bcu par mthar lan
NK080(wu)005:1959: re gyur pa'i ye shes gnas gyur te bogs su
NK080(wu)005:1961: de bas nad mthar yang bzhir 'dod pas dang /
NK080(wu)005:1962: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes su 'dod pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1963: de'i mtshan nyid ni sgyu ma dang ma skyes pa
NK080(wu)005:1964: la so sor dmigs pa'i yul du byed pa'i gtan
NK080(wu)005:1965: tshigs kyis bya dang rgyud mthun par skye ba dang
NK080(wu)005:1966: / sku dang sprul pa sogs snang bas kun rdzob
NK080(wu)005:1967: tu rgyal ba'i ye shes kyang skad cig mar 'dod
NK080(wu)005:1969: de las gsang sngags pa'i ye shes dpags par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:1970: rnal sogs stong nyid ye shes dang //
NK080(wu)005:1971: don shes skabs kyi ye shes bzhi //
NK080(wu)005:1973: rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor gyis bsdus pa ni /
NK080(wu)005:1974: rnal 'byor chen po dang rnal 'byor dag go /de dag gi lugs kyis /
NK080(wu)005:1975: rim pa yod mod kyang rang gi sems snang stong
NK080(wu)005:1976: gnyis su med par ye nas gsal ba bzhi don
NK080(wu)005:1977: gyi kun gazhi'o // don de rtogs pa'i ye shes
NK080(wu)005:1978: nyid la'ang gnas skabs kyis don de rig pa yul
NK080(wu)005:1979: med par gsal la mi rtog pa'i phyir dang /
NK080(wu)005:1980: blang dor med par ye nas gsal ba'i phyir dang /
NK080(wu)005:1981: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gsal ba'i phyir dang /
NK080(wu)005:1982: bdag gzhan bya ba ye shes lhun gyi grub pa'i
NK080(wu)005:1983: don gsal ba'i phyir nges tshig grub pa ni gtan
NK080(wu)005:1984: tshigs kyis don la rgyas te /
NK080(wu)005:1985: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang //
NK080(wu)005:1986: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang //
NK080(wu)005:1987: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
NK080(wu)005:1988: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
NK080(wu)005:1989: tshogs brgyad ma spangs par dag mod kyang ye shes ye yin pa mngon du byas pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1990: de yang stong pa'i ye shes dngos po med /
NK080(wu)005:1991: me long ye shes rtog pa med /
NK080(wu)005:1992: mnyam nyid ye shes che chung med /
NK080(wu)005:1993: so sor rtog pa ma 'dres gsal /
NK080(wu)005:1994: bya ba nan tan mthar phyin pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:1997: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni /
NK080(wu)005:1998: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
NK080(wu)005:2000: log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing //
NK080(wu)005:2001: ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir //
NK080(wu)005:2002: thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na //
NK080(wu)005:2003: 'groo drug dus gnas ma lus snang //
NK080(wu)005:2005: rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste /
NK080(wu)005:2006: de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med /
NK080(wu)005:2008: mtho dman kun gyi gzugs snang dang /
NK080(wu)005:2009: bla med byang chub sku snang ba /
NK080(wu)005:2010: me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du /
NK080(wu)005:2011: sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang /
NK080(wu)005:2014: spyod yul med pas me tog bzhin mkhyen pa'i dpes gsal bar bstan pas /
NK080(wu)005:2015: lung man ngag 'cham pa ni don dang mi 'gal bar dgongs so //
NK080(wu)005:2016: de la 'dun pa'i rno ngar dang /
NK080(wu)005:2020: rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i lam rim yod mod kyang /
NK080(wu)005:2021: dang po nas 'bras bu la lam du byas pas rgyu las 'bras bur gnas mi 'gyur gyi /
NK080(wu)005:2022: tshogs brgyad lnga dang gnyis ye yin pa'i don du byas pa'i skabs ming tsam ste /
NK080(wu)005:2023: ma bcos par snang ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2024: nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2025: dbyibs dang kha dog lta bur gyur pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2026: 'ja' tshon lta bur gyur pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2027: sprin rlangs lta bur gyur pas mtshon dgos so //
NK080(wu)005:2029: don grangs kyis kyang khyad par 'gyur //
NK080(wu)005:2031: don gyi khyad par ni gsang ba'i ye shes yul dang bral ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2032: skad gcig ma yengs par yon tan lnga'i rgyun du shar ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2033: kun rdzob lam du ma yin te gnyis su med pa nyid yin pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2034: kun tu brtag pa ma yin pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2035: grangs ni bzhi dang lngar 'dod pa'i khyad par ro //
NK080(wu)005:2036: gnas 'gyur tshul dang khyad par yang mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK080(wu)005:2037: de bas na rang rang gi lta gzhi'i don las de ltar lnga dang gnyis su smra 'o //
NK080(wu)005:2038: shin tu rnal 'byor gyi ye shes gang snyam pa la /
NK080(wu)005:2039: kun ye rang rig ye gsal ba'ang /
NK080(wu)005:2040: gcig kyang ma bsgribs nges pa'i tshig /ces pa /
NK080(wu)005:2041: chos so cog thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid rig
NK080(wu)005:2042: pa rang snang du bye brag phyed pa dang yongs
NK080(wu)005:2043: su rdzogs par rang gsal ba ni /
NK080(wu)005:2044: spyod yul med pas sgrib byed med par gsal ba'i phyir ye shes zhes bya'o //
NK080(wu)005:2045: ye shes kyi ming grangs kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2046: rang byung rang rig dbyings mi gnas /
NK080(wu)005:2047: skabs ming bzhi phyir gcig med pa /
NK080(wu)005:2049: bshad zin pa gsal bar bstan pa ni /
NK080(wu)005:2050: rang byung gi ye shes zhes bya ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2051: rang rig pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2052: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes zhes bya ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2053: mi gnas pa'i ye shes zhes skabs las btags pa'i
NK080(wu)005:2054: gtan tshigs kyis ye shes chen po ni gcig kyang
NK080(wu)005:2055: ma yin la du mar yang rgya ma chad do
NK080(wu)005:2056: // chos kun ma 'dres bdag gsal phyir //
NK080(wu)005:2057: ye shes rnam grangs bsam mi khyab //
NK080(wu)005:2059: grangs tshad ni ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa la rang rig snang ba'i gtan tshigs kyis /
NK080(wu)005:2060: tha snyad thams cad dang dran rtog thams cad rang
NK080(wu)005:2061: byung ye shes rang snang bas grangs tshad bsam pa
NK080(wu)005:2063: lam pa'i dus na'ang da ltar gsal bar yod na /
NK080(wu)005:2064: rgyal ba'i gang snyam pa la /
NK080(wu)005:2065: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yang //
NK080(wu)005:2066: ye shes yul med cang mi shes //
NK080(wu)005:2067: ma lus bdag gsal rtog med pa //
NK080(wu)005:2068: ye shes ming gnyis dngos gcig pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2070: brtags pa'i sangs rgyas tsam ma yin pas ye shes kyang /
NK080(wu)005:2071: 'dir thams cad bdag nyid chen por rang snang ba'i phyir spyod yul bral bas mkhyen du med do //
NK080(wu)005:2072: 'o na mun pa rang 'dra'o bar dogs pa la
NK080(wu)005:2073: 'di dngos yul tsam yang bcad pa la brjod kyi
NK080(wu)005:2074: / mkhyen lugs ni thams cad bdag nyid chen por
NK080(wu)005:2075: rang snang du gsal la ma 'dres shing zin chags
NK080(wu)005:2076: dang bral bas mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang rnam
NK080(wu)005:2077: par thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ming gnyis
NK080(wu)005:2078: skabs las btags kyi ngo bo shin tu gcig par
NK080(wu)005:2079: / dgongs so // don grangs kyi khyad par gnyis ni /
NK080(wu)005:2080: mdo sde'i lta ci smos rnal 'byor bdag gi yul med pa dngos yul yod de /
NK080(wu)005:2082: lang+ka'i bdag po ma 'dres pa dang //
NK080(wu)005:2084: ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad dang /
NK080(wu)005:2085: rgyun dang dmigs pa med pa ste /
NK080(wu)005:2086: de dag ni lta bar snang bar rig par bya'o //
NK080(wu)005:2088: 'dir rang snang shin tu yul bral ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2089: shin tu skad cig ma med par rgyun dang bcas pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2090: shin tu dus kyi rgyud du rang snang bas ci'ang ma 'gags par re ba skong ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2091: gnyis su med pa'i tha snyad las 'das pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2092: shin tu 'ang kun brtags ma yin pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2093: gnas 'gyur med de rang dag pa yin pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2094: sa'i rim par mi 'gyur ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2096: grangs ni bsam yas pas khyad par du gyur pa kho na'o //
NK080(wu)005:2097: lhag pa'i 'bras bu khyad par bstan pa'i phyir //
NK080(wu)005:2100: yul med par mthong ba smos pa don gyi dbang gang la dgongs she na /
NK080(wu)005:2101: ngo bo med pa dang spyod yul bral bas mthong
NK080(wu)005:2102: du med pa nyid kyi rig pa'i nyams rnyed pa
NK080(wu)005:2103: ni mthong ba dam pa yin par dgongs te /
NK080(wu)005:2105: chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang //
NK080(wu)005:2106: ma mthong sems can sems mi mthong //
NK080(wu)005:2107: sangs rgyas mi mthong gang mthong ba //
NK080(wu)005:2108: des na yang dag bden pa mthong //
NK080(wu)005:2109: brjod med rang nyid nyams rnyed la //
NK080(wu)005:2110: mthong rnyed tha snyad tsam du brjod //
NK080(wu)005:2111: ces snang ba ltar nges pas ci zhig mthong zhe na /
NK080(wu)005:2112: logs nas thob pa med de /
NK080(wu)005:2113: ji bzhin nyid gshegs kho na'i phyir //
NK080(wu)005:2115: de ltar rang rig pa'i mngon sum du bya ba ni /
NK080(wu)005:2116: phyin pa med par snying po byang chub ma bslad
NK080(wu)005:2117: par son pa yin pa'i gtan tshigs kyis de bzhin
NK080(wu)005:2118: gshegs pa zhes de nyid la bya'o //
NK080(wu)005:2119: ji bzhin pa yi dngos de bzhin //
NK080(wu)005:2120: rtag gnyis bral ba'i ye shes sku //
NK080(wu)005:2121: ngo bo nyid rtag brjod las 'das //
NK080(wu)005:2123: ma bslad ma bcos ma byas ma brtags rnal ma /
NK080(wu)005:2125: mdog ma bsgyur ba'i ngo bo ji bzhin du der
NK080(wu)005:2126: son pa'i ye shes kyang ther zug med pa skad
NK080(wu)005:2127: cig ma / mi skye ba'i ngo bor ye nas
NK080(wu)005:2128: rang gsal ba ni shin tu byin rlabs kyis brjod
NK080(wu)005:2129: pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i ngo bo ni cir snang cir
NK080(wu)005:2131: phyogs gcig gi dbang du gyur nas gzhan 'gog pa med pas sa le sbram lta bur gnas kyang /
NK080(wu)005:2132: mtshan nyid 'di 'drar bstan cing brjod du mi btub ste /
NK080(wu)005:2133: brjod do cog mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:2134: brtags sogs thad ka'i chos kun kyang //
NK080(wu)005:2135: sems phyir yod med ma dmigs pas //
NK080(wu)005:2136: blong dor byed dang don gyis bral //
NK080(wu)005:2138: kun tu bzang po'i thig le mngon du byas pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2139: 'khrul pa'i kun tu brtags pa'i shes pa skad cig
NK080(wu)005:2140: ma'i rim pa'i tha dad du yul lta bur snang
NK080(wu)005:2141: ba'i gzung ba 'dzin pa kun rjes su mthun par
NK080(wu)005:2142: sems kyi ngo bo yin pa'i gtan tshigs kyis rang
NK080(wu)005:2143: rgyud kyang med / snang ba'ang ma 'gags pas mtha' gsum dang bral ba'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2144: bzang ngan la spang len med pa'i longs spyod chen pa'i sangs rgyas so //
NK080(wu)005:2145: 'du shes rang bzhin ye shes kyang //
NK080(wu)005:2148: 'dir snang ba sna tshogs kyi 'du shes ye shes rang yin pas ma spangs pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2149: mi mthun pa ni de lta'ang mtshan mar zhen pa
NK080(wu)005:2150: thams cad ma bkag par mi ldan pas bcom ldan
NK080(wu)005:2151: 'das chen po'o // rang byung ye shes mngon byas pa'i //
NK080(wu)005:2152: nyi ma bye ba'i 'od brdal yang /
NK080(wu)005:2154: rkyen bral ye shes kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i
NK080(wu)005:2155: ye shes kyi nyi ma bye ba dus gcig tu
NK080(wu)005:2156: shar ba ltar ye shes kyi sku'i 'od 'gro ba
NK080(wu)005:2157: / bsgos pa med par kun la khyab ste 'od kun gyi dngos gazhi'o //
NK080(wu)005:2159: spyod yul sbyangs bsgyur med par ston pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2160: dus dang rnam pa thams cad du //
NK080(wu)005:2161: sangs ma rgyas par bya byed pa'i //
NK080(wu)005:2162: chos ni rdul tsam yod min pas //
NK080(wu)005:2163: sangs rgyas med pa'i che bar gsungs //
NK080(wu)005:2165: 'khor ba'i chos de nyid ye nas sangs rgyas pa
NK080(wu)005:2166: yin pa'i che ba'i ngo bo bas dus gsum snga
NK080(wu)005:2167: ba nas phyi pa'i rnam pa rol du sangs ma
NK080(wu)005:2168: rgyas pa rgyas par bya ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2169: rgyas par byed pa'i cha pa rdul phra rab tsam
NK080(wu)005:2170: yang rang rgyud med pa'i gtan tshigs kyis sangs rgyas
NK080(wu)005:2171: par 'dod pa'i zhen pa dang 'bras bu'i dngos gzhi
NK080(wu)005:2172: ming tsam yang med pas thams cad nas thams cad
NK080(wu)005:2173: du sangs rgyas pa med pa'i che bar bka' stsal
NK080(wu)005:2175: des na snying po byang chub skur ye nas bzhugs pa tshad dpag tu med pas /
NK080(wu)005:2176: sku gsum mam lngar 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dag
NK080(wu)005:2177: gis 'di mngon sum du thob par mi dgongs so
NK080(wu)005:2178: // lam 'di ma gtogs par lam gzhan gyis 'tshang
NK080(wu)005:2179: mi rgya bas thabs dang dus kyi khyad par ston
NK080(wu)005:2180: // te / bskal pa'i grangs dang tshe rabs su //
NK080(wu)005:2181: dman pas blang dor ci byas dang //
NK080(wu)005:2182: 'bring gis dmigs par grol thob kyang //
NK080(wu)005:2184: gang bus pa dag dbu ma bas bskal pa grangs
NK080(wu)005:2185: med pa gsum la sogs kyi yul du shes rab
NK080(wu)005:2186: 'phang dma' ba'i bus pas 'khor ba dor te mya
NK080(wu)005:2187: ngan las 'das pa blang ba'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2188: thabs kyang mthong yang bsgom pa yang yang gis gnyer ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2189: thun mong gi thabs dang shes rab la brten pas
NK080(wu)005:2190: dkar gnag spong len byas pas bcu gcig sa 'grub
NK080(wu)005:2191: pa dang / gong 'og ltos pas skal ba 'bring po sngags kyi theg pa bzhis /
NK080(wu)005:2192: bskal phran nyi shu dang tshe rabs mang nyung bzhed
NK080(wu)005:2193: so so'i dus kyi lha'i rnal 'byor gyi gzhung lugs
NK080(wu)005:2194: ltar rtse gcig tu byas pa'i thabs kyis 'bras bu
NK080(wu)005:2195: lam du byas pas gzung 'dzin gyis bcings pa med
NK080(wu)005:2196: par so so'i sa thob pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2197: kyang ni mi mthun pa ste /
NK080(wu)005:2198: de dag btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi /
NK080(wu)005:2199: yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'thob par bstan pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2200: don 'di nyams su ma myong na //
NK080(wu)005:2201: brtags pa nyid las ma gtogs pa'i //
NK080(wu)005:2202: spang thob ngo bo gdod nas med //
NK080(wu)005:2204: sus gza' gtad dang bral ba'i don nye bar bzung bar ma mthong na /
NK080(wu)005:2205: rjes thob man chad ched du byas pa'i kun brtags
NK080(wu)005:2206: kyi lta ba ste yang dag par ma nor ba
NK080(wu)005:2207: ma yin pas / des lta ba'i sgrib pa byang
NK080(wu)005:2208: ba dang tshogs chen po'i dngos po mthong ba'i gzhi
NK080(wu)005:2209: ye nas med de thabs chung la dus ring ngo
NK080(wu)005:2210: ma yin pas / // 'dir dus dang rten thabs kyi rtsol ba la rag ma lus so //
NK080(wu)005:2212: bde gshegs ma lus yum du gyur pas rgyal ba kun gyi lam gcig go //
NK080(wu)005:2213: tshul khrims la sogs pha rol phyin lam spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pas /
NK080(wu)005:2215: ji snyed 'phags pa'i rnal grol lam du bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang /
NK080(wu)005:2216: byang chub sems nyid rdzogs las de yi yon tan de dag de las byung /
NK080(wu)005:2217: 'phags pa'i rigs chen 'chi med byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad da kyang /
NK080(wu)005:2218: de med mi 'byung de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do //
NK080(wu)005:2219: zhes bka' las snang ba nges so //
NK080(wu)005:2220: bshad pa'i rjes su seng phrug gi tshul gyis lta spyod kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2221: dngos drug dmigs dang gzhan don gyi /
NK080(wu)005:2222: 'du shes rgyun dang bya las grol /
NK080(wu)005:2224: bshad pa'i lta ngan drug la dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang /
NK080(wu)005:2225: gzhan don bya ba rtsol ba 'di la med pas dgongs spyod khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2226: dgongs rtsol byed pa'i mi spang rtsol ba med pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2228: bdag gi mu mtha' yas sangs rgyas //
NK080(wu)005:2229: ji bzhin bder gyur kun bdag rdzogs /
NK080(wu)005:2230: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag rdzogs //
NK080(wu)005:2232: bdag 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kun tu gdal ba'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2233: de bzhin nyid mngon du gyur pa'i phyir dang /
NK080(wu)005:2234: bdag nyid chen por ma nor bar thams cad kyis
NK080(wu)005:2235: 'dus pa mngon du byas pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes
NK080(wu)005:2236: bya'o // de bzhin gshegs zhes bya'o //
NK080(wu)005:2237: yang dag pa rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
NK080(wu)005:2238: de sogs tha snyad tsam du zad //
NK080(wu)005:2240: rgyal ba'i mtshan nyid kyis bsdus pa ni //
NK080(wu)005:2241: rgyal ba dang bder gshegs la sogs par btags /
NK080(wu)005:2243: de dag ngo bo la rang rgyud med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
NK080(wu)005:2244: yon tan gyi bla dwags te yang dag 'dzin 'gog pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2245: rnal 'byor chen po'i 'bras bu dang khyad par che bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2246: dman 'bras sku dang ye shes mchog /dngos nyid shin tu rnam dag dang //
NK080(wu)005:2247: gnyer med don gzhi rnam par shes //
NK080(wu)005:2248: ming gsum ldan par mchog gi gzhung //
NK080(wu)005:2250: ltos pas dbang dma' ba'i rnal 'byor chen po la
NK080(wu)005:2251: sogs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' sku lnga ye shes lnga
NK080(wu)005:2252: la sogs pa khyad par can dang 'dir gang yin
NK080(wu)005:2254: rang gi bzhi po dgu pa ste /
NK080(wu)005:2255: dngos po thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral bar gsal ba'i phyir dang /
NK080(wu)005:2256: 'jigs pa'i gnyer po bral ba'i phyir dang /
NK080(wu)005:2257: chos thams cad kyi gazhi'am ngo bo yin yang bstan du mi btub pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2258: ming du de kho na nyid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes kyang bya /
NK080(wu)005:2259: gnyer po med pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes kyang bya /
NK080(wu)005:2260: rang bzhin med pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes kyang
NK080(wu)005:2261: bya ba'i mtshan gsum can 'bras bur 'dod pas rang
NK080(wu)005:2262: las 'char ba ni lhag pa'i rnal 'byor gyi gzhung
NK080(wu)005:2263: ngo // ye shes chen po mtshan nyid brtag par dka' ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2264: tshogs brgyad la sogs chos kun dang //
NK080(wu)005:2265: dngos gcig gsal bas tha dad pa //
NK080(wu)005:2267: rnam par shes pa brgyad nang gi chos kyis bsdus pa'i tshogs kyis bsdu ba ni yul rnams so //
NK080(wu)005:2268: de bas na phyi nang gi chos dang dgu pa'i
NK080(wu)005:2269: ye shes dngos po gcig kyang gsal bas tha dad
NK080(wu)005:2271: ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad yod par 'dod de /
NK080(wu)005:2272: ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad kyang mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
NK080(wu)005:2273: dngos med ye shes sna tshogs can //
NK080(wu)005:2274: dngos gnyis chos kun ldan bral min //
NK080(wu)005:2276: gzhi de snang stong gi ngo bor mi zin cing
NK080(wu)005:2277: ye shes kun ldan pa de 'khor ba dang mya
NK080(wu)005:2278: ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang /
NK080(wu)005:2279: bshad pa'i gcig dang tha snyad kyis ldan bral gnyis kar mi zin par 'dod pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2280: don de yul du byed pa dag 'khrul par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2283: mchog gi bltas na yul du byed par yod pa'i
NK080(wu)005:2284: phyir rnal 'byor gyis mngon du byed pas yang dag
NK080(wu)005:2285: pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin no //
NK080(wu)005:2286: de ltar na ni 'di nas yang don du gnyer
NK080(wu)005:2287: dgos so zhes gzung ba'i blo bskyed na'ang 'di ltar
NK080(wu)005:2288: snang ste / drug par mtshan gsol ba'i longs spyod
NK080(wu)005:2289: chen po'i sangs rgyas rgyud so sor las grags pa
NK080(wu)005:2290: snang ste / so so ba / rgyud las 'khor
NK080(wu)005:2291: ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad kyi
NK080(wu)005:2292: rang bzhin dang tha mi dad par ston pa ni
NK080(wu)005:2293: snang ste / so so ba / / rang bzhin
NK080(wu)005:2294: bshad pa'i ste tha snyad tsam yang de dang 'dra
NK080(wu)005:2295: snang ste / so so ba / / ba la
NK080(wu)005:2296: / dgongs pa bshad pa skabs kyi rang rig pa'i
NK080(wu)005:2298: ltos na rnal 'byor gyi yul du snang ngo //
NK080(wu)005:2299: de bdag gis bstan par mi nus kyang /
NK080(wu)005:2303: tshogs chen 'dus dang rtsal chen rdzogs //
NK080(wu)005:2304: gsum du brjod pa shes par bya //
NK080(wu)005:2305: phyag rgya chen po sgyu ma yin //
NK080(wu)005:2306: 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal chen po //
NK080(wu)005:2307: mthong ba'i gnas na bcu drug pa //
NK080(wu)005:2308: rdzogs pa'i gnas na longs spyod pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2309: gdal ba'i chos nyid sa 'di la //
NK080(wu)005:2310: rol pa rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang //
NK080(wu)005:2311: bde ba che dang thig ler rdzogs //
NK080(wu)005:2312: gsum nyid du ni snang ba la //
NK080(wu)005:2313: yul don ye shes de sbyar bas //
NK080(wu)005:2314: shes par bya bas thams cad rdzogs //
NK080(wu)005:2315: sgyu ma ma yin snang ba'o //
NK080(wu)005:2317: rnal 'byor chen po'i lam gsum gyis rgyal ba longs spyod gsang ba can thob nas /
NK080(wu)005:2318: 'dod spyod kyi ma gos pad+ma spyan du bsgral ba'i sa thob kyang /
NK080(wu)005:2319: da dung rjes su rnal 'byor gyis lam gsum gyi
NK080(wu)005:2320: 'bras bu thams cad ye shes sgyu ma ye shes
NK080(wu)005:2321: 'khor lo tshogs chen thob pa'i sa de ma thob
NK080(wu)005:2322: pas / yi ge 'khor lo'i sa rdzogs pa spyir
NK080(wu)005:2323: chibs la 'gro bar gsungs pa dag go /yang rgyal
NK080(wu)005:2324: ba rigs lnga de dang po bskal pa mngon dga'
NK080(wu)005:2325: la sangs rgyas khri sum stong byung ba'i tha ma
NK080(wu)005:2326: sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i bstan
NK080(wu)005:2332: khye'u lngar gyur pas sems brgyad na yar bskyed de
NK080(wu)005:2333: tha ma sprul pa'i rgyal tshab tu gyur nas dga'
NK080(wu)005:2334: ldan na theg pa chen po ston kyang gsang sngags
NK080(wu)005:2335: kyi nges pa ma rnyed par gsungs pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2336: yang rigs lnga dang po khye'u lngar gyur pas sems
NK080(wu)005:2337: bskyed nas 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par
NK080(wu)005:2338: snang byed kyi bu lngar skyes pa'i rgyu sangs rgyas
NK080(wu)005:2339: lnga la sems bskyed nas bu lnga ru gyur pa'i
NK080(wu)005:2340: tshe / rnal 'byor lnga'i rim pas ting 'dzin lnga
NK080(wu)005:2341: thob na ltas lnga mthong nas skyes bu rgyal tshab
NK080(wu)005:2342: lnga thob kyang gsang sngags ma rtogs te /
NK080(wu)005:2344: de la lar ni rgyal tshab skyes bur zhes bya ba brjod cing de ltar grags so //
NK080(wu)005:2345: la lar ni srid pa tha ma pa zhes bya bar brjod cing de ltar grags so //
NK080(wu)005:2346: la lar ni sa chen po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya
NK080(wu)005:2347: bar brjod cing grags kyang sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa
NK080(wu)005:2349: mnyam pa la 'jog dgos pa'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:2351: yo ga'i sdug po bkod pa man chad kyang rnal 'byor gi mngon sum du dgongs so //
NK080(wu)005:2352: de nas rgyal tshab lngas gsang sngags kyi ngo bo
NK080(wu)005:2353: nyams su ma myong nas dang po'i sangs rgyas rdo
NK080(wu)005:2354: rje sems dpa' la mnyam par ma bzhag par bdag
NK080(wu)005:2355: cag gis ma rtogs pa ci lags zhus pas /
NK080(wu)005:2357: yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gsum las gnyis rdzogs
NK080(wu)005:2358: kyang blo gros ma chub pas chub par gyis shig
NK080(wu)005:2359: par gdams pas / rgyal tshab lngas rtogs thabs zhus pas /
NK080(wu)005:2361: sngags kyi dngos po brgyad kyi phyir bstan dkar bar
NK080(wu)005:2362: gdams ngag mdzad pas rgyal tshab lnga gsang sgo bye
NK080(wu)005:2363: ste gsang sngags dngos po brgyad du shes nas pad+ma
NK080(wu)005:2364: spyan gyi sa non par dgongs te /
NK080(wu)005:2365: zab mo'i sgo dang po yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK080(wu)005:2366: yang rtogs thabs zhus pa'i lan du /
NK080(wu)005:2367: 'di skad du gsang sngags ni kun gyi thun mong ma yin te /
NK080(wu)005:2368: don de kho na nyid ni sangs rgyas nyag gcig gi dgongs pa smrar med pa /
NK080(wu)005:2369: rtog dpyod thams cad dang bral ba 'di zhes mtshon
NK080(wu)005:2370: du med pa brtag par dka' zhing bstan par dka'
NK080(wu)005:2371: la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral ba /
NK080(wu)005:2373: nam mkhas kyang bsgrun du yod pa ma yin pa /
NK080(wu)005:2374: tshad med pa tshad dang bral ba /
NK080(wu)005:2376: dpag pas mi dpogs pa ste /
NK080(wu)005:2377: khyed kyis ji ltar ma shes ma thos pa de
NK080(wu)005:2378: lta rgyud yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang
NK080(wu)005:2379: chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang da dud gsang
NK080(wu)005:2380: sngag kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid mngon par
NK080(wu)005:2381: ma thob / mngon par ma rtogs /
NK080(wu)005:2382: mngon par ma rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so //
NK080(wu)005:2384: gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de de kho na nyid
NK080(wu)005:2385: rnam par yongs su dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang
NK080(wu)005:2386: byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi dmigs shing btsal du
NK080(wu)005:2387: med pa la sa bcu la gnas pa'i skyes bu
NK080(wu)005:2389: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gsang sngags kyi ngo
NK080(wu)005:2390: bo de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa de
NK080(wu)005:2391: rang la yod par ma shes te /
NK080(wu)005:2393: spyod pa dang ma bral la /
NK080(wu)005:2394: sangs rgyas rnams ni snying po byang chub la mi rtog pa'i ngang du mi g.yo bar gnas te /
NK080(wu)005:2395: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar gnas na
NK080(wu)005:2396: khyed ci'i phyir du bar byed ces gsungs pas kyang
NK080(wu)005:2400: lan du gsang sngags mtha' lnga bcu rtsa lnga las grol zhing mtha' ma spangs par grol bar /
NK080(wu)005:2401: rang byung rang rig tu bka' stsal pas 'di skad du /
NK080(wu)005:2402: skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis blang dor med par
NK080(wu)005:2403: chud de ngo mar skyes nas the tshom du gyur
NK080(wu)005:2405: bdag cag gis dam pa rnams la sngon du thos pa lta na /
NK080(wu)005:2406: sngon gyi dam pa rnams ni byang chub blang ngo //
NK080(wu)005:2408: des ni blo gros yongs su chub pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2412: rang byang chub la gnyis su med pas /
NK080(wu)005:2413: blang dor med pas zhes gsungs pas ngo mtshar ro snyams du cang mi gsung bar gnas so //
NK080(wu)005:2415: de'i tshe gdams ngag gi dbang gis gdal ba chos nyid kyi sa non par dgongs so //
NK080(wu)005:2416: de nas yang gdams ngag mdzad de /
NK080(wu)005:2418: kye skyes bu dam pa rnams gang khyed the tshom
NK080(wu)005:2419: yongs su za ba na nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin
NK080(wu)005:2421: byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin gang las byung /
NK080(wu)005:2423: gang yongs su mthong ba nyid na the tshom chad par 'gyur ro //
NK080(wu)005:2425: skyes bu dam pa de rnams kyis nyon mongs pa
NK080(wu)005:2426: dang byang chub de'i rang bzhin gang yin gang las
NK080(wu)005:2427: byung brtags na / rang bzhin stong par mthong /
NK080(wu)005:2428: rtsa ba sems las byung bar mthong /
NK080(wu)005:2429: sems nyid ma byung ma skyes te skye ba med pa ye ji bzhin pa /
NK080(wu)005:2430: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa /
NK080(wu)005:2431: rtsa ba byung chub sems kyi dam pa de kho
NK080(wu)005:2432: na nyid du nges par chud de sangs rgyas kyi
NK080(wu)005:2433: dgongs pa nyams su myong ba ni 'di lta ste
NK080(wu)005:2434: / sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad nam mkha' lta bur gyur to //
NK080(wu)005:2435: mnyam par bzhag pa dang ma bzhag pa las 'das te /
NK080(wu)005:2436: tha ma'i dbugs phyin nas yang dag pa'i nges pa yongs su rnyed par gyur te //
NK080(wu)005:2437: kun tu rab tu rnyed nas rnyed pa med pa las snang ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2439: bshes gnyen dam pa de nyid las //
NK080(wu)005:2440: nges pa rnyed nas dbugs chen phyin //
NK080(wu)005:2441: sangs rgyas mnyam dang nyid du grol //
NK080(wu)005:2442: de nyid chen por lhun gyis grub //
NK080(wu)005:2444: rgyal tshab lngas rang byung gi ye shes rang rig
NK080(wu)005:2445: pa'i mngon sum du byas nas ye shes bla ma'i
NK080(wu)005:2446: sa rdzogs pa spyir chib kyis sa gzod thob ste
NK080(wu)005:2448: de'i tshe dbang bskur bas 'tshang rgya ba'i rim pa'ang /
NK080(wu)005:2449: sprul pa'i rgyal tshab tu byung ba'i dus la bab pa la dbang spyin pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2450: la la ni ye shes kyi longs spyod rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i dus la bab pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2451: la la lung nges par bstan pa'i dus la bab pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2452: la la gsang ba'i snying por nges pa'i dus la bab pa'i phyir dbang bskur bar yod par ltar /
NK080(wu)005:2453: khye'u lnga rgyal tshab sems dpa' lnga la dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i rgyal bar gyur /
NK080(wu)005:2454: de nyid la dbang bskur bas yang dag par sangs
NK080(wu)005:2455: rgyas par dka' las snang ba'i phyir 'bras bu la
NK080(wu)005:2456: khyad par yod par dgongs so //
NK080(wu)005:2457: de bas 'di ni shin tu dpags lugs bstan pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2458: mchog gi rang rig mngon sum du //
NK080(wu)005:2459: rang gsal grol thob gnyis las 'das //
NK080(wu)005:2461: shin tu rnal 'byor mchog gis sems ming gsum can
NK080(wu)005:2462: rang byung ye shes ming bzhi'i ngo bonyida yul med
NK080(wu)005:2463: par gsal ba lhag pa'i rang rig mngon sum du
NK080(wu)005:2464: rang gsal la bcings pa gdod nas med pa'i phyir
NK080(wu)005:2465: dang / 'bras bu'i dngos gzhir rang gsal ba'i phyir brjod pa bzhin no //
NK080(wu)005:2466: ngo bo bsam brjod ril dang bral /
NK080(wu)005:2467: sangs rgyas kyis kyang bstan dka' ba /
NK080(wu)005:2468: dman don gzhung gis ga la rdzogs //
NK080(wu)005:2470: ye shes bla ma'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo yul du med pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2472: tshig brjod mthar gyur pa bshad pa bzhin la /
NK080(wu)005:2473: rgyal bas ngo bo ga la rnyed de bstan par dka' bar brjod zin pa de /
NK080(wu)005:2474: rgyud dag pa'i sangs rgyas rigs lnga la sogs pas
NK080(wu)005:2475: kyang rang rig pa'i mngon sum du gyur pa med
NK080(wu)005:2476: de dmigs ltas mi rnyed pa ni then 'dzer dmig
NK080(wu)005:2477: tu then 'dzud pas nam mkha' mi mthong ba lta
NK080(wu)005:2478: bu'i phyir / gsang ba blo dman gyi ched du
NK080(wu)005:2479: brjod pa'i lung dang rgyud kyi gzhung gis kyang mthar
NK080(wu)005:2480: phyin par mi 'gyur ba'i tha tshig go /gtan tshigs
NK080(wu)005:2481: rang don gyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir //
NK080(wu)005:2482: de yi rjes 'jug tshad dag kyang //
NK080(wu)005:2483: dngos de nyid la rnam med na //
NK080(wu)005:2485: theg pa gong 'og gi don la snyog pa gnyis
NK080(wu)005:2486: ni 'jug pa'i gzu bo'i gtan tshigs kyis blo'i tshad
NK080(wu)005:2487: ma dang grub mtha'i tshad rnams ma 'dres pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2488: mi mthun pa ni de gzhi la rang rgyud du ma grub pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2489: 'gyur ba ni tha dad du shes rab kyis gzhi gcig las snang par 'chad pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2490: rang bzhin las kyi rtsal rim pas //
NK080(wu)005:2492: rigs pa gnyis kyis bshad zin to //
NK080(wu)005:2493: bcos phyogs sbyang rgyud thabs rtsal gyis //
NK080(wu)005:2494: mi ldog rim par mngon bya'i phyir //
NK080(wu)005:2496: phyin ci log spyod kyi skyon rnams byis pa bas spyod pa /
NK080(wu)005:2497: sprul pa'i rjes su bsgyur te 'gegs //
NK080(wu)005:2498: theg pa chen po byang chub kyi phyogs dang pha rol phyin pa khad kyis spyod zhing /
NK080(wu)005:2499: bya ba gnyer po 'phro 'dus sbyong sreg bzlog pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2500: rnal 'byor pa rgyud kyi lta bas 'joms pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2501: rnal 'byor chen pos thabs kyi dbang du byed cing spyod pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2502: rjes su rnal 'byor pa rig pa'i rtsal snang gi
NK080(wu)005:2503: lta bas spang du med pa ru bzlog ste so
NK080(wu)005:2504: so'i gzhung spyod cing go bas /
NK080(wu)005:2505: 'khor ba mi ldog pas 'bras bu mngon du byed cing cir 'gyur byed pa dgos ched do //
NK080(wu)005:2506: gtan tshigs bzhi sogs rim bkod pas //
NK080(wu)005:2507: dngos de nyid shes kun smra yang //
NK080(wu)005:2509: bshad pa'i so so'i gtan tshigs dbu ma'i mu bzhi
NK080(wu)005:2510: 'gog pa dang gzhan pa dag theg pa'i rim pa
NK080(wu)005:2511: ltar gzhung bkod de gtan la phab pas /
NK080(wu)005:2512: dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mthong rtogs so //
NK080(wu)005:2513: zhes theg chen lnga pa kun brjod de rang gis mthong ba la nges shing lhag par 'dzin to //
NK080(wu)005:2514: yang na de dag log par 'dren pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2515: btsal bral bya med don rig na //
NK080(wu)005:2516: rjes sogs ltos brtags kho nar snang //
NK080(wu)005:2519: de dag bu mo'i dpes a nu yo gas bsdus
NK080(wu)005:2520: pa'i theg pa rnams kun brtags yin par bskabs su
NK080(wu)005:2521: brjod zin to // de bas na /
NK080(wu)005:2522: mchog rtse gzhung gi tshad gsum nyid //
NK080(wu)005:2524: lung dang man ngag dang mi 'gal ba'i rig pa mi bslu bas mthong ste /
NK080(wu)005:2526: de bas gsang sngags bdag nyid che //
NK080(wu)005:2527: dngos grub rlabs chen 'khrigs pa can //
NK080(wu)005:2528: bsam yas gting gi dpag dka' bas //
NK080(wu)005:2529: lung dang man ngag thos pas 'grub //
NK080(wu)005:2531: ston pa nges pa'i lung dang bla ma rnams kyi man ngag de nyid don 'dir blta'ang /
NK080(wu)005:2533: bzhi sogs so so'i tshad ma yin //
NK080(wu)005:2538: rig pa bzhis dbu ma pa la 'jal ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2539: theg pa so so'i gtan tshigs kyi tshad ma bsdu'o //
NK080(wu)005:2540: dngos de nyid bzung gang de nyid /
NK080(wu)005:2543: so so'i gtan tshigs kyis mthong ba'i don so so'i
NK080(wu)005:2544: grub mtha' de yang dag par rtogs par bya ba'i
NK080(wu)005:2545: gnas ma yin te gnyis ka kun brtags phyir ro
NK080(wu)005:2547: gsang sngags rgya mtsho chen po ni //
NK080(wu)005:2548: dpe dang tshad ma gtan tshigs dang //
NK080(wu)005:2549: rjes su dpog dang shes rab kyis //
NK080(wu)005:2550: rtogs par nus pa ma yin te //
NK080(wu)005:2553: mngon sum la sogs rgyu yin dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i mtha' dpyod pa /
NK080(wu)005:2554: de nyid rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs spyod yul tshad mar bzhag nas blo yis 'jig byed cing /
NK080(wu)005:2555: rtog mtha' med phyir dpyod mtha' med de snying po med na tshad ma gang //
NK080(wu)005:2556: de'i phyir 'jig rten brtags pa'i tha snyad rnal 'byor lam 'dir mi dgos so //
NK080(wu)005:2558: gtan tshigs la khyad par che bar dgongs te sgra mthun pa yang don tha dad pas dpags pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2560: spangs pa'i rang rig gang yin pa //
NK080(wu)005:2561: khyu mchog mdo ris lta bu'i tshad //
NK080(wu)005:2563: de'i phyir 'og ma rnams kyi gtan tshigs dang grub
NK080(wu)005:2564: pa'i mtha' lta bu kun brtags dang 'dir bral ba'i
NK080(wu)005:2565: lta ba yin med par brjod zin pa ni /
NK080(wu)005:2566: dper khyu mchog ni glang po che'o //
NK080(wu)005:2567: glang po brgya la gcig la mdo ris med pa ni mchog tu gyur pa ltar /
NK080(wu)005:2568: gza' gtad med pa ni kun brtags gnyis kyis ma
NK080(wu)005:2569: 'khyud pas rgyal ba'i dgongs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir
NK080(wu)005:2570: tshad ma ste mi bslu ba'o //
NK080(wu)005:2571: 'o na lhag pa'i rno ngar pas de bzhin gshegs pa ltar mi spyod pa ci snyam pa la /
NK080(wu)005:2573: dper na seng phrug rtsal sbyong ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2574: seng chen mchong ba ni mchong ba 'dra yang /
NK080(wu)005:2578: zil gyis gnon pa'i lto bas che chung dang /
NK080(wu)005:2579: khebs 'og tu gsal mi gsal khyad par yod kyang
NK080(wu)005:2580: skye bas ma brgyud par seng chen du 'byung ba
NK080(wu)005:2581: ltar / lhag pa'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad mkhyen
NK080(wu)005:2582: pa rtogs nas bsgoms pa'i yul med kyang kun brtags
NK080(wu)005:2583: la goms pas stobs tshad du ma phyin pa'i phyir
NK080(wu)005:2587: bdud bzhi gdan du ma non pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2588: mngon shes drug dang thams cad mkhyen pa mngon du ma snang yang /
NK080(wu)005:2589: de nyid la lhun gyis grub par rigs nges pas skye ba mi brgyud /
NK080(wu)005:2590: sa'i rim pa mi spyod par stobs de nyid rdzogs pas chog ste dman pa'i ngo na'o //
NK080(wu)005:2591: ngo bo nyid las sogs 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
NK080(wu)005:2592: 'o na tshad ma de mthong rtags kyi tshad cis bzung zhe na /
NK080(wu)005:2595: rmi lam bden pa mthong ba bdud kyi las dang ma 'dres par yod pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2597: dam la rub cing pha la drin //
NK080(wu)005:2598: rgyun du gtong zhing mi spang bzod //
NK080(wu)005:2600: 'dod spyod mi rtog sbyor byed cing //
NK080(wu)005:2601: dpa' gong zhum dang dman sems chung //
NK080(wu)005:2602: ci la ma chags ser sna med //
NK080(wu)005:2603: bdud la mi nga g.yang mi za //
NK080(wu)005:2604: slar spyod zhib la gzhan don dpa' //gsang thub nges la brtan pa skyong /
NK080(wu)005:2605: khong la 'gying pa mi byed cing /
NK080(wu)005:2606: mched la dmigs lta 'gro la bu /
NK080(wu)005:2607: chos brgyad mnyam byed dgra gnyen snyoms /
NK080(wu)005:2608: bden mthong ltas brgyad 'char ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2609: de la skyes bu spyan can de /
NK080(wu)005:2610: phal cher ldan na'ang khas 'ches rung /
NK080(wu)005:2611: bcu gnyis brgyad dang ldan pa na /
NK080(wu)005:2612: rtogs par khas 'ches snying re rje /
NK080(wu)005:2613: nor bu rgyal sa rnyed pa bzhin /
NK080(wu)005:2614: ci spyad snyegs pas sgo dgur ltung /
NK080(wu)005:2616: shin tu don dang ldan par bya'o //
NK080(wu)005:2617: 'o na tang rtogs pa'i yon tan ni /
NK080(wu)005:2618: gzung dang ldan pas nam du'ang mi ltung ste sa chen po la sbyor ro //
NK080(wu)005:2619: rgyas par stong gsum khas 'ches kyang mi rdzogs pas
NK080(wu)005:2620: ma bsdus te lung gi rjes su 'brongs shig pa'i
NK080(wu)005:2621: tha tshig go // lhag pa'i lta ba tshad ma ni //
NK080(wu)005:2622: de phyir lam kun mkhas spyod la //
NK080(wu)005:2623: nam mkha' rmad sogs rjes mthun par //
NK080(wu)005:2624: myong ba'i nyams bsdur mi 'gal rig /tshig spangs yid ches tshad mar gsungs //
NK080(wu)005:2626: lta ba dang gtan tshig la khyad par yod pa'i gtan tshigs kyis /
NK080(wu)005:2627: thun mong gi lam kun la mkhas par byas te
NK080(wu)005:2628: bsdur la bung ba khung tshol ba lta bur mthar
NK080(wu)005:2629: rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che dang /
NK080(wu)005:2630: byang chub sems rmad du byung ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2631: bsdu ba ni man ngag gi rgyud dang man ngag
NK080(wu)005:2632: gi yi ge bco brgyad dag go /de dag gi
NK080(wu)005:2633: mtshon lugs dang mthun par rig pas ro tsho ba
NK080(wu)005:2634: ni tshad ma gsum bsdur bas 'tsham par mthong ba
NK080(wu)005:2635: yang rang rig pas mngon sum du byas pas sgra'i
NK080(wu)005:2636: rnam pa tsam med par the tshom bral bar gdeng
NK080(wu)005:2637: chud pa ni / bden pa chen po man ngag gi bka' du ma las gsungs so //
NK080(wu)005:2639: ma lus sems phyir snang mi 'dzin //
NK080(wu)005:2641: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis yul dang bral bas snang ba mi spong la zhen pa med pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2642: ci yang yin phyir cir mi gnas //
NK080(wu)005:2644: mtshan nyid thams cad pa yin pa'i gtan tshigs kyi gcig tu mi zin pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2645: thams cad bdag phyir thob spangs med //
NK080(wu)005:2647: bdag nyid chen po yin pa'i gtan tshigs kyis sdug bsngal spang zhing 'bras bu thob tu med pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2648: bdag gzhan don bral cang mi 'gog /ces pa /
NK080(wu)005:2649: bdag gzhan ma spangs gnyis med pas //
NK080(wu)005:2650: bya ba'ang med la bya ba'ang mi 'gog ste //
NK080(wu)005:2651: bdag dang gzhan du mi 'byed pas //
NK080(wu)005:2652: sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol //
NK080(wu)005:2654: khas blangs pa'i mdo dang rtsa ba gtsor bstan pa'i phyir /
NK080(wu)005:2655: lta sgom 'bras spyod gtan tshigs mdo //
NK080(wu)005:2657: gza' gtad med pa'i shes rab spyan dang //
NK080(wu)005:2658: dgag sgrub med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
NK080(wu)005:2659: rgyus ma bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu dang //
NK080(wu)005:2660: bya btsal med pa'i spyod sogs gtan la 'bebs pa'i gtan tshig mang na'ang mdor bsdus te bstan /
NK080(wu)005:2662: mdo bzhi dang rtsa ba gsum mo //
NK080(wu)005:2665: thun mong du ni 'di skad du /
NK080(wu)005:2666: lang+ka'i bdag po de la mdo gang zhe na /
NK080(wu)005:2670: btsal ba med par lung bstan pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2671: lang+ka'i bdag po de dag ni gzhan gyi skye ba med pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2675: ma 'dres pa gang yin pa nyid de /
NK080(wu)005:2677: mthun mong ma yin par 'di skad du /
NK080(wu)005:2678: lang+ka'i bdag po mdo bzhi gang zhe na /
NK080(wu)005:2680: gang thos pas nges par 'byung ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2681: gang mthong bas nges par 'byung ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2682: gang gis mngon sum par nges par 'byung ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2683: gang nas gang du nges par 'byung ba med pa'o zhes snang ba'o //
NK080(wu)005:2688: lang+ka'i bdag po de la rtsa ba gang zhe na /
NK080(wu)005:2690: de kho na nyid gang yin pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2692: yongs su zin pa'o zhes snang ngo //
NK080(wu)005:2693: khyad par gyi ni 'di lta te /
NK080(wu)005:2694: rtsa ba ni me long dang /
NK080(wu)005:2698: me long ni mtshon pa'i rtsa ba ste dpe nam mkha' la sogs pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2699: mi mthun pa'i skyon gyi rtsa ba bdun pa'i spyod yul lo //
NK080(wu)005:2703: theg pa kun gyi yang rtser nges pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2704: lung thams cad kyi rgyal po byang chub sems yin par nges pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2705: lung thams cad kyi spyi 'grel du nges /
NK080(wu)005:2706: man ngag thams cad kyi rtsa bar nges /
NK080(wu)005:2707: bka' thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su nges /
NK080(wu)005:2708: don thams cad kyi mjug sdud du nges /
NK080(wu)005:2709: chos thams cad kyi me long yin par nges pa'i
NK080(wu)005:2710: don mtshon pa'i me long ri rab lhun po'i rtse
NK080(wu)005:2713: rgyal po bka' gsang thob pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2714: nam mkha' la kun 'byung ba dang /
NK080(wu)005:2715: bya ba'i don grub pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2716: me long ngos kyis mtshon pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2718: nges zin gtan tshigs drug /ces pa /
NK080(wu)005:2719: chos thams cad ma bcos par nges pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2720: yong gis 'od gsal ba nges pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2721: bdag nyid gcig pur lhun gyis grub par nges pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2724: skyon yon blang dor med par nges pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2726: ye shes rgyun du 'char phyir chos nyid mthong zin /
NK080(wu)005:2727: snying rje rgyun du 'char bas sdug bsngal sbyangs zin /
NK080(wu)005:2728: phrin las rgyun du 'char phyin don byas zin /
NK080(wu)005:2729: smon lam rgyun du 'grub phyir yon tan thams cad grub zin /
NK080(wu)005:2730: yon tan lhun gyis rdzogs phyir don gyi che ba bcom zin /
NK080(wu)005:2731: dngos grub rgyud du 'char phyir 'bras bu thob zin pa'o //
NK080(wu)005:2732: de mthong byed kyi gtan tshigs drug ste /
NK080(wu)005:2733: ngang gis dben pa'i gtan tshigs dang /
NK080(wu)005:2734: don byed nus pa'i gtan tshigs dang /
NK080(wu)005:2735: bsdu bar mthun par snang ba'i gtan tshigs dang /
NK080(wu)005:2736: ngang dang rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po gsum du 'dus pa'i gtan tshigs dang /
NK080(wu)005:2737: dbyings dang ye shes su 'dus pa'i gtan tshigs dang /
NK080(wu)005:2738: nges par bdag 'di chen po gcig las med pa'i gtan tshigs so //
NK080(wu)005:2739: tshul gyis nges pa bcu gnyis sogs /
NK080(wu)005:2742: khas blangs pa'i mthong rtags 'chad de /
NK080(wu)005:2743: yon tan sgyu mar snang ba'i tshul gyis skyon la dngos gzhi med par yid ches /
NK080(wu)005:2744: de bzhin du byams la rang ma chags pas sdang la sems mi 'khrugs /
NK080(wu)005:2745: snang srid nam mkhar gcig pas dngos po rang bzhin med /
NK080(wu)005:2746: snang srid sgyu mar snang bas kun gzhi dngos po med /
NK080(wu)005:2747: chos nyid snying por gyur pas sangs rgyas gzhan na med /
NK080(wu)005:2748: dran rig sna tshogs rgyu bas ye shes rgyun du 'char /
NK080(wu)005:2749: gsal ba'i sgron mar gyur pas ye shes nyi mar 'char /
NK080(wu)005:2750: yid bzhin 'byung gnas sems gyur 'dod par rang las byung /
NK080(wu)005:2751: sems la skye shi med pas 'chi 'pho 'jigs dang bral /
NK080(wu)005:2752: gnas la nges pa med pas 'pho 'gyur nyams mi nga /
NK080(wu)005:2753: ma rtogs rtog bya med pas rtsol sgrub ka dang bral /
NK080(wu)005:2754: rtogs na sangs rgyas yin pas sa rnam bgrod du med /
NK080(wu)005:2756: des bsdus pa ni nges pa'i snga ltas lnga la sogs pa dang /
NK080(wu)005:2757: shin tu rnal 'byor gyi skabs su bden zhing rigs
NK080(wu)005:2758: par lta bas shes par gyis shig par gdams so
NK080(wu)005:2759: // gzhung ngan gribs mas lta ba long thug bzhin /
NK080(wu)005:2760: ming lus gzhung nub ma 'dres rmongs don du /
NK080(wu)005:2761: la shan me long 'di bsdus bsod nams gang /
NK080(wu)005:2762: 'gro kun dngos po de nyid mngon byed shog /ces pa /
NK080(wu)005:2764: la shan lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba //
NK080(wu)005:2766: dpe las mtshan gsol ba ste /
NK080(wu)005:2768: don mchog lta 'phang la shan ma 'dres gsal ba yang /
NK080(wu)005:2769: lta gzhung so so'i sgrib phyir gab spas phyung /
NK080(wu)005:2770: man ngag tha ram ldeb mig 'grel phyogs tsam /
NK080(wu)005:2771: mthong bas bshad byar bdag pas dman phyir ru /
NK080(wu)005:2772: rnam par bshad nongs mnyam nyid ngang du bshags /
NK080(wu)005:2773: ngal ba'i dge rtsas yang dag sangs rgyas shog /la shan gyi rnam par bshad pa /
NK080(wu)005:2774: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshegs gnyen phyi mas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
NK080(wu)005:2775: rgya gar mkhas pa rnams kyi kha brgyud nas /
NK080(wu)005:2776: bka' ba bcu drug bsdos btsal sgron ma 'di /
NK080(wu)005:2777: bod kyi nyi ma ban d+he bdag gis btsal /
NK080(wu)005:2778: g.yu sgra snying po rin chen bu la gtad /
